title: dayavillaiyA dayALO
sahitya:
dayavillaiyA dayALO endan tAyum tandaiyum nIyallavO enmEl


anupallavi

  jaya jaya nanda kumArA yamunA jala kallOla vihArA
jaya jagan mOhanAkArA jaya jaya muni jana mandArA innum


caraNam    viNNODum kaivalya nannADum vENDEn vEruLLa dEvEndra padaviyum vENDEn
kaNNA kaNNA enrun nAmamE sholvEn kaikoDuttAlum viDuttAlum engu shelvEn innum
